Investor.description: A legal or institutional entity making investments (e.g., Audax, Blue Owl)

Fund.description: A vehicle managed by an investor, with defined mandate and lifecycle

Deal.description: A specific transaction, acquisition, or investment opportunity

TargetCompany.description: The company involved in a deal

Mandate.description: Fund criteria (check size, geography, sector, deal type)

Sponsor.description: PE firm initiating the deal (may overlap with Investor)

Relationship.description: Historical relationships between investors, sponsors, or companies

Event.description: Includes Bid, Investment, Exit, DDProcess, AuctionStart, etc.

HAS_INTEREST_IN.description: Indicates an investor's interest in a specific market sector.
